description: Return the minimum value k such that replacing every element greater than k with k makes the sum of the array at most equal to a given limit.

testCases.explanation: With k=3, replace all elements > 3 with 3: [3,3,3], sum=9. If limit=8, k=2: [2,2,2] sum=6<=8. Minimum k satisfying the limit depends on the limit parameter.
All elements are already 1; minimum k=1 as no reduction is needed.
Single element; k must be at least the element itself if the limit is met at that value.
With very tight limit, minimum k=1 reduces all elements to 1, sum=3.
With k=4: [2,4,4,4] sum=14. Depending on limit=14, minimum k=4.
